DOC.brief_summary: Individuals of advanced age with cardiovascular disease are at higher risk of fall.The aim of this study is to explore the effect of specific exercise program based on balance and coordination on stability parameters
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Exercise Training Programs On Balance in Older Adults With CVD
DOC.criteria: Has Cardiovascular disease, under the supervision of a cardiologist Participates in a cardiovascular rehabilitation center Able to undergo physical activity for 60 minutes twice a week All Other
